answers.answer: hi,i experienced this in my pregnancy. i didn't have a solid mucous plug i would get the small masses like you describe. could be your plug. in any case i wouldn't worry too much just yet. its clear and didn't hurt. perhaps make a note of it to discuss with your doctor though.hope dinner did the trick. ; )
Aww okay thanks :) makes me feel better cause my midwife said if anythin werid happens go to ER but i felt fine. Dinner did the trick just great :)
Im almost 16 weeks with gestational diabetes also and I have notice a clear discharge also and but my dr said its normal unless there is some blood to it

question: Hi ladies i dont post much but im currently 17 weeks and 3 days pregnant. I have gestational diabeties. Last night i made a suprise dinner for my hubby that way i could get some loving i was supper horny (tmi sorry) but i just went pee and expierenced clots of mucus its clear with no oder or itching. Is there anything i should worry about?
title: discharge
